peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the best free app to identify art?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: There are a few good options for free art identification apps, such as Google Arts & Culture, Smartify, and Magnus. They utilize image recognition technology to identify artworks from photos you take or upload. Each has its strengths, so try a couple to see which interface or database works best for you!
